title: Reconnecting with Yourself – Healing Workshop
description: A gentle evening of reflection and guided sharing to help you reconnect with your inner self. Through breath, journaling, and soft conversation, we'll explore what self-love truly means after exhaustion or heartbreak.
note: Women only. Bring a notebook and wear something comfortable.

title: Emotional Boundaries and Self-Worth
description: A live online session about emotional boundaries — how to say no without guilt, and how to protect your peace. Together, we'll talk about people-pleasing, self-respect, and the power of choosing yourself.
note: Hosted by therapist Anna Liu. Free but registration required.

title: From Anxiety to Calm – Mindful Healing Night
description: This guided meditation and gentle breathwork circle is for women who often feel overwhelmed, restless, or emotionally tired. Learn grounding techniques to return to calm and safety within yourself.
note: Suitable for beginners. Please bring water and a light scarf or blanket.

title: Letting Go with Love – Closure & Release Circle
description: Sometimes healing means saying goodbye with grace. In this women's circle, we'll release past relationships, regrets, or expectations that still weigh on the heart — and replace them with compassion.
note: All materials provided. Limited to 20 participants.

title: Gentle Strength – Building Confidence from Within
description: An empowering talk and group reflection on rebuilding confidence after emotional challenges. We'll explore how vulnerability, self-kindness, and community support can help you stand strong again.
note: Hosted by life coach Mia Tang. Bring your favourite tea and an open heart.
